transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, namaste.
Customer: Namaste sir.
Customer: Abhi suniye hamare most mein datt ko paya datt se.
Executive: Haan sir, bataiye Vikas ji.
Customer: Sir, ye abhi jo desktop pe isko install karna hai, usme kya procedure hai?
Executive: Desktop pe kya karna hai sir?
Customer: Abhi isko aapko jo hai na IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Abhi online ja ke usko click karte hai na to install karke rakhna hai na isme.
Executive: Laptop ke andar. Hai na?
Customer: Haan, nahi nahi apna ye PC hai mera uske upar.
Executive: To PC pe sir website open kariyega Google Chrome mein, main bata de raha hu.
Customer: Google.
Executive: Google Chrome apna open kariye Chrome. Ya kaun sa browser use karte hai aap India mein?
Customer: Haan, Google Chrome open kiya.
Executive: Waha pe daliye sir seller.indiamart.com.
Customer: Kya kya?
Executive: seller.indiamart.com.
Executive: S e d o l l seller. Haan.
Executive: Dot. Direct open hoga wo.
Customer: Haan ji?
Customer: Open ho gaya na wo?
Executive: Nahi direct nahi sir login karna padega aapko.
Customer: Abhi login hi nahi raha hamara bas isme login reh raha hai wo lekin wo har bar karna padta hai humko ye.
Executive: Har bar login karna padta hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir login details agar aap save kar lo ya fir apna mail waha pe login kar do to mail se directly aap login ho jaoge automatic.
Customer: Haan wahi automatically hona chahiye to lekin hota nahi na wo.
Executive: Mail aapka login rehta hai sir is system mein isme email id.
Customer: Haan. Login hai na.
Executive: Ah ye wala mail aapka id, theek hai. Sir aap mail se directly select kar liya karo direct login ho jata hai mail se. Aise nahi to aapko number dal ke OTP dalna padta hoga, right?
Customer: Haan. Hmm.
Executive: Bookmark mein dal ke aap ya to save kar lo sir na. Hmm.
Executive: To directly aapka mail hi wo agar isme login hoga to mail se directly ek bar agar aap login kar loge to bar bar aapka mail se hi login ho jata hai. Wahi issue nahi hai. Wahi hona chahiye.
Customer: Kya waisa hota nahi na.
Executive: Ho raha hai sir abhi dekho select karo aap. Haan?
Executive: Dekho sir abhi. Ho gaya login kya? Aapne dobara se login kiya hoga to dobara se login thodi na mang raha hoga. Nahi ek minute. Nahi ho raha hai ho raha hai abhi.
Executive: Ho raha hai na? Hmm. Haan wahi keh raha hu sir. Email id agar aapki login rahegi system mein to wo automatic utha lega wo. Theek hai, theek hai okay. Beech beech mein refresh karte rahiyega. Aisa nahi hai theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Baki sir main na ek Dipanshi ji aapko dobara se feedback share kar raha hu. Theek hai mail pe. Please share kariye thoda sa. Theek hai. Apne staff ko boliye sir Dipanshi ji se connected rahe, right? Haan theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing login issues on desktop.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to login via Google Chrome.
- Executive suggested saving login details or using mail.
- Executive suggested refreshing the system.
- Executive will share feedback form via Dipanshi.


Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login, desktop, google chrome, email
